CustomField.description: Indicates whether the submitted value matches the current value on Account/Opportunity.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( Billing_City__c ) || ISBLANK( Account__r.BillingCity ), "", IF( Billing_City__c = Account__r.BillingCity, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150P000005PRdt","YES"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150P000005PRcW", "NO") + " " + Account__r.BillingCity ) )
CustomField.label: Match? - Billing City
